name: StatusON
tag_list: ios-app, nightlife, clubbing, events, lbs, mobile-video
overview: StatusON was created with a general idea in mind to personalise and improve existing local nightlife entertainment marketing. Modern world of targeted marketing is heavily based on consumer preference and social influence, and StatusON brings a simple use of information platform based on business-to-consumer interaction. Being a niche and and focused service, we provide users with addictive social nightlife experience through iOS app, while creating an efficient low-cost promotion opportunity for the local party venues. We are a swiss startup, created in 2011 and initially self-funded.
